level.heading: REIMBURSEMENT RATES[COLON] CASE MANAGEMENT SERVICES (ยง 29-4208)

level.text: Case management services shall be reimbursed at the following levels:
For initial assessments, five hundred dollars ($500.00) shall be reimbursed by MAA;
For monthly assessments, one hundred and twenty-five dollars ($125.00) shall be reimbursed by the MAA;
For annual re-assessments, two hundred and twenty-five dollars ($225.00) shall be reimbursed by the MAA.
